subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Poised on the edge of a 10-meter board towering over a public diving pool in the southern English city of Southampton, Tom Daley looks small, isolated and younger than his 13 years.
snippet: Poised on the edge of a 10-meter board towering over a public diving pool in the southern English city of Southampton, Tom Daley looks small, isolated and younger than his 13 years.
